list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a natural oily or greasy substance occurring in animal bodies, especially when deposited as a layer under the skin or around certain organs.
(of a person or animal) having a large amount of excess flesh.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the driver was a fat, wheezing man
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người lái xe là một người đàn ông béo, thở khò khè

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: numbers of black cattle are fatted here
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Số lượng gia súc đen được vỗ béo ở đây
